entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
